build.buildCommand: sh -c 'cd frontend && npm install && npm run build --configuration=production && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt'

deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'cd backend && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py migrate && gunicorn stock_api.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 3 --timeout 120'
